title: Connect 4 Design
subtitle: UI/UX Designer
alt: connect 4 stylized board as well as some screens asking you to accept or create a game along with a chat
description:
2024 

This was one of my first successful dark mode designs. I'm much more familiar with light mode design because it's a personal preference, but I really enjoy dark design especially with material cards. 

I'm not a fan of the harsh colors of the connect 4 board online, so I changed them into colors that I really enjoy instead :) I also made the board more minimalistic and I love it, however this is not a design a lot of my friends enjoy. It is very tailored towards my personal preferences and that works only because it was a personal project for a class. 

One of my favorite parts of the design is how I use the yellow and pink player colors to tailor the UI for each player during game play.
